title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 §§ 635-1.1 - Applicability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 §§ 635-1.1 - Applicability

State Regulations
(a) This Part
contains requirements applicable to programs, services or facilities (as
specified herein) funded or certified by the Office for People With

Developmental Disabilities, hereinafter referred to as OPWDD (see
glossary). (b) In a family care
home, the sponsoring agency (see glossary) and the holder of the operating
certificate shall be responsible for ensuring compliance with this Part as
specified. (c) This Part is
controlling over any Part of 14 NYCRR insofar as the requirements herein may be
concerned, unless said Part provides that it is controlling. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14
§§
635-1.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
